verses.verse: וְאַתָּ֨ה <S%H859><s%> you בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> And thou son אָדָ֜ם <S%H120><s%> of man קַח־ <S%H3947><s%> take לְךָ֣ ׀ חֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> knife חַדָּ֗ה <S%H2299><s%> thee a sharp תַּ֤עַר <S%H8593><s%> razor הַגַּלָּבִים֙ <S%H1532><s%> thee a barber's תִּקָּחֶ֣נָּה <S%H3947><s%> take לָּ֔ךְ וְהַעֲבַרְתָּ֥ <S%H5674><s%> and cause [it] to pass עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹאשְׁךָ֖ <S%H7218><s%> upon thine head וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and זְקָנֶ֑ךָ <S%H2206><s%> and upon thy beard וְלָקַחְתָּ֥ <S%H3947><s%> then take לְךָ֛ מֹאזְנֵ֥י <S%H3976><s%> thee balances מִשְׁקָ֖ל <S%H4948><s%> to weigh וְחִלַּקְתָּֽם׃ <S%H2505><s%> and divide

שְׁלִשִׁ֗ית <S%H7992><s%> a third part בָּא֤וּר <S%H217><s%> with fire תַּבְעִיר֙ <S%H1197><s%> Thou shalt burn בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city כִּמְלֹ֖את <S%H4390><s%> are fulfilled יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> when the days הַמָּצ֑וֹר <S%H4692><s%> of the siege וְלָֽקַחְתָּ֣ <S%H3947><s%> and thou shalt take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשְּׁלִשִׁ֗ית <S%H7992><s%> a third part תַּכֶּ֤ה <S%H5221><s%> [and] smite בַחֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H2719><s%> it with a knife סְבִ֣יבוֹתֶ֔יהָ <S%H5439><s%> about וְהַשְּׁלִשִׁית֙ <S%H7992><s%> and a third part תִּזְרֶ֣ה <S%H2219><s%> thou shalt scatter לָר֔וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> in the wind וְחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> a sword אָרִ֥יק <S%H7324><s%> and I will draw out אַחֲרֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H310><s%> after

וְלָקַחְתָּ֥ <S%H3947><s%> Thou shalt also take מִשָּׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> also מְעַ֣ט <S%H4592><s%> thereof a few בְּמִסְפָּ֑ר <S%H4557><s%> in number וְצַרְתָּ֥ <S%H6696><s%> and bind אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בִּכְנָפֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H3671><s%> them in thy skirts

וּמֵהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> like ע֣וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again תִּקָּ֔ח <S%H3947><s%> Then take of them again וְהִשְׁלַכְתָּ֤ <S%H7993><s%> and cast אוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into תּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> them into the midst הָאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> of the fire וְשָׂרַפְתָּ֥ <S%H8313><s%> and burn אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בָּאֵ֑שׁ <S%H784><s%> them in the fire מִמֶּ֥נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> some תֵצֵא־ <S%H3318><s%> come forth אֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> [for] thereof shall a fire אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> into all the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel פ

כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהֹוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD זֹ֚את <S%H2063><s%> likewise יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> This [is] Jerusalem בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> it in the midst הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> of the nations שַׂמְתִּ֑יהָ <S%H7760><s%> I have set וּסְבִיבוֹתֶ֖יהָ <S%H5439><s%> [that are] round about אֲרָצֽוֹת׃ <S%H776><s%> and countries

וַתֶּ֨מֶר <S%H4784><s%> And she hath changed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁפָּטַ֤י <S%H4941><s%> my judgments לְרִשְׁעָה֙ <S%H7564><s%> into wickedness מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> more הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> more than the nations וְאֶ֨ת־ <S%H853><s%> חֻקּוֹתַ֔י <S%H2708><s%> and my statutes מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> than הָאֲרָצ֖וֹת <S%H776><s%> more than the countries אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which סְבִיבוֹתֶ֑יהָ <S%H5439><s%> that [are] round about כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for בְמִשְׁפָּטַי֙ <S%H4941><s%> my judgments מָאָ֔סוּ <S%H3988><s%> her for they have refused וְחֻקּוֹתַ֖י <S%H2708><s%> and my statutes לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הָלְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> they have not walked בָהֶֽם׃ ס

לָכֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> GOD יַ֤עַן <S%H3282><s%> Because הֲמָנְכֶם֙ <S%H1995><s%> Because ye multiplied מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> have more הַגּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> more than the nations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which סְבִיבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5439><s%> that [are] round about בְּחֻקּוֹתַי֙ <S%H2708><s%> in my statutes לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor הֲלַכְתֶּ֔ם <S%H1980><s%> you [and] have not walked וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁפָּטַ֖י <S%H4941><s%> my judgments לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor עֲשִׂיתֶ֑ם <S%H6213><s%> neither have kept וּֽכְמִשְׁפְּטֵ֧י <S%H4941><s%> according to the judgments הַגּוֹיִ֛ם <S%H1471><s%> of the nations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which סְבִיבוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H5439><s%> that [are] round about לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor עֲשִׂיתֶֽם׃ <S%H6213><s%> neither have done ס

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> therefore כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD הִנְנִ֥י <S%H2005><s%> behold עָלַ֖יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> I am against גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> even אָ֑נִי <S%H589><s%> I וְעָשִׂ֧יתִי <S%H6213><s%> Behold I even I [am] against thee and will execute בְתוֹכֵ֛ךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst מִשְׁפָּטִ֖ים <S%H4941><s%> judgments לְעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> of thee in the sight הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> of the nations

וְעָשִׂ֣יתִי <S%H6213><s%> And I will do בָ֗ךְ אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> what לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will never עָשִׂ֔יתִי <S%H6213><s%> in thee that which I have not done וְאֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> of which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will never אֶעֱשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> and whereunto I will not do כָמֹ֖הוּ <S%H3644><s%> and the like ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again יַ֖עַן <S%H3282><s%> any more the like because כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all תּוֹעֲבֹתָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H8441><s%> of all thine abominations ס

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore אָב֞וֹת <S%H1><s%> Therefore the fathers יֹאכְל֤וּ <S%H398><s%> shall eat בָנִים֙ <S%H1121><s%> the sons בְּתוֹכֵ֔ךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst וּבָנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> of thee and the sons יֹאכְל֣וּ <S%H398><s%> shall eat אֲבוֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> their fathers וְעָשִׂ֤יתִי <S%H6213><s%> and I will execute בָךְ֙ שְׁפָטִ֔ים <S%H8201><s%> judgments וְזֵרִיתִ֥י <S%H2219><s%> of thee will I scatter אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שְׁאֵרִיתֵ֖ךְ <S%H7611><s%> in thee and the whole remnant לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to every רֽוּחַ׃ <S%H7307><s%> into all the winds פ

לָכֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> So חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> Wherefore [as] I live אָ֗נִי <S%H589><s%> I נְאֻם֮ <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִה֒ <S%H3069><s%> GOD אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo לֹ֗א <S%H3808><s%> no יַ֚עַן <S%H3282><s%> because אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִקְדָּשִׁ֣י <S%H4720><s%> my sanctuary טִמֵּ֔את <S%H2930><s%> Surely because thou hast defiled בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שִׁקּוּצַ֖יִךְ <S%H8251><s%> with all thy detestable things וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all תּוֹעֲבֹתָ֑יִךְ <S%H8441><s%> and with all thine abominations וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> will also אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> I אֶגְרַע֙ <S%H1639><s%> therefore will I also diminish וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no תָח֣וֹס <S%H2347><s%> spare עֵינִ֔י <S%H5869><s%> [thee] neither shall mine eye וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> will also אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no אֶחְמֽוֹל׃ <S%H2550><s%> neither will I have any pity

שְׁלִשִׁתֵ֞יךְ <S%H7992><s%> A third part בַּדֶּ֣בֶר <S%H1698><s%> with the pestilence יָמ֗וּתוּ <S%H4191><s%> of thee shall die וּבָֽרָעָב֙ <S%H7458><s%> and with famine יִכְל֣וּ <S%H3615><s%> shall they be consumed בְתוֹכֵ֔ךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst וְהַ֨שְּׁלִשִׁ֔ית <S%H7992><s%> of thee and a third part בַּחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword יִפְּל֣וּ <S%H5307><s%> shall fall סְבִיבוֹתָ֑יִךְ <S%H5439><s%> round about וְהַשְּׁלִישִׁית֙ <S%H7992><s%> a third part לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to every ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> into all the winds אֱזָרֶ֔ה <S%H2219><s%> thee and I will scatter וְחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> a sword אָרִ֥יק <S%H7324><s%> and I will draw out אַחֲרֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H310><s%> after

וְכָלָ֣ה <S%H3615><s%> be accomplished אַפִּ֗י <S%H639><s%> Thus shall mine anger וַהֲנִחוֹתִ֧י <S%H5117><s%> to rest חֲמָתִ֛י <S%H2534><s%> and I will cause my fury בָּ֖ם וְהִנֶּחָ֑מְתִּי <S%H5162><s%> upon them and I will be comforted וְֽיָדְע֞וּ <S%H3045><s%> and they shall know כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> that I the LORD דִּבַּ֙רְתִּי֙ <S%H1696><s%> have spoken בְּקִנְאָתִ֔י <S%H7068><s%> [it] in my zeal בְּכַלּוֹתִ֥י <S%H3615><s%> when I have accomplished חֲמָתִ֖י <S%H2534><s%> my fury בָּֽם׃

וְאֶתְּנֵךְ֙ <S%H5414><s%> Moreover I will make לְחָרְבָּ֣ה <S%H2723><s%> thee waste וּלְחֶרְפָּ֔ה <S%H2781><s%> and a reproach בַּגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> among the nations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which סְבִיבוֹתָ֑יִךְ <S%H5439><s%> that [are] round about לְעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> thee in the sight כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all עוֹבֵֽר׃ <S%H5674><s%> of all that pass by

וְֽהָ֨יְתָ֜ה <S%H1961><s%> will be a חֶרְפָּ֤ה <S%H2781><s%> So it shall be a reproach וּגְדוּפָה֙ <S%H1422><s%> and a taunt מוּסָ֣ר <S%H4148><s%> an instruction וּמְשַׁמָּ֔ה <S%H4923><s%> and an astonishment לַגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> unto the nations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who סְבִיבוֹתָ֑יִךְ <S%H5439><s%> that [are] round about בַּעֲשׂוֹתִי֩ <S%H6213><s%> thee when I shall execute בָ֨ךְ שְׁפָטִ֜ים <S%H8201><s%> judgments בְּאַ֤ף <S%H639><s%> in thee in anger וּבְחֵמָה֙ <S%H2534><s%> and in fury וּבְתֹכְח֣וֹת <S%H8433><s%> rebukes חֵמָ֔ה <S%H2534><s%> and in furious אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> I the LORD דִּבַּֽרְתִּי׃ <S%H1696><s%> have spoken

בְּֽשַׁלְּחִ֡י <S%H7971><s%> When I shall send אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חִצֵּי֩ <S%H2671><s%> arrows הָרָעָ֨ב <S%H7458><s%> of famine הָרָעִ֤ים <S%H7451><s%> upon them the evil בָּהֶם֙ אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become לְמַשְׁחִ֔ית <S%H4889><s%> which shall be for [their] destruction אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom אֲשַׁלַּ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> [and] which I will send אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> לְשַֽׁחֶתְכֶ֑ם <S%H7843><s%> to destroy וְרָעָב֙ <S%H7458><s%> the famine אֹסֵ֣ף <S%H3254><s%> you and I will increase עֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> upon וְשָׁבַרְתִּ֥י <S%H7665><s%> upon you and will break לָכֶ֖ם מַטֵּה־ <S%H4294><s%> your staff לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H3899><s%> of bread

וְשִׁלַּחְתִּ֣י <S%H7971><s%> So will I send עֲ֠לֵיכֶם <S%H5921><s%> on רָעָ֞ב <S%H7458><s%> upon you famine וְחַיָּ֤ה <S%H2416><s%> beasts רָעָה֙ <S%H7451><s%> and evil וְשִׁכְּלֻ֔ךְ <S%H7921><s%> and they shall bereave וְדֶ֥בֶר <S%H1698><s%> thee and pestilence וָדָ֖ם <S%H1818><s%> and blood יַעֲבָר־ <S%H5674><s%> shall pass through בָּ֑ךְ וְחֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H2719><s%> the sword אָבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> thee and I will bring עָלַ֔יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> and אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> upon thee I the LORD דִּבַּֽרְתִּי׃ <S%H1696><s%> have spoken פ
